p: Figure 2A shows the TVB-N values for different treatments during storage. The initial values of TVB-N were from 15.05 to 17.78 mg N per100 g of muscle. The highest amount of TVB-N on the last day for the control sample and the vacuum sample was 50.05 and 41.30 mg N/100 g of muscle, respectively. The amount of TVB-N in the control and vacuum samples as well as coated samples during storage was increased significantly ( p â‰¤ 0.05).
